snippet: A federal judge who was arrested after he was accused on Saturday of assaulting his wife will be not assigned any new cases for now.
abstract: United States Court of Appeals for Eleventh Circuit announces that Federal District Court Judge Mark E Fuller of Alabama, who was arrested after he was accused of assaulting his wife, will lose his docket until further notice.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge who was arrested after he was accused on Saturday of assaulting his wife will be not assigned any new cases for now.

headline.main: Alabama: Federal Judge Loses His Docket After an Arrest
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Federal Judge Loses His Docket After an Arrest
